data.message: I would like to be able to send/receive messages on my phone without downloading messenger. It used to work before now it's prompting me to download messenger every time I try to open up messages. Please advise.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Bianca. We want to make everyday messaging fast, reliable, useful and fun. We're confident Messenger is the way to do that. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2f0ixsa. -Joe
I don't want to download it though. Can I just get the old one back?
Facebook, can't you read what Bianca said? She doesn't want the stupid app.

Don't download it Bianca. They are reaching too desperately to get people to download this app for some reason. Seems extremely sketchy to me the lengths they are going to. I will never download it after the amount of hassle I have endured and having my messaging rights on even SAFARI Facebook version taken away from me. Sketchy sketchy.

Nope not downloading it ✋🏼 Lol it seems too much of a hassle. Why can't we just get access to the old one? It didn't give me any problems. I'm all for technology and updating, but why fix something that's not broken?
Use www.facebook.com/home.php instead of M.facebook in URL (make sure you do this on homepage)
